name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing (Unkown Studios)
description:
A game of Farming! Fun! Murder! Murder?

Wolf in Sheep’s Clothing is an investigation and deduction game set on an Idyllic farmstead. The player takes the role of a farmer investigating their own flock in order to discover which sheep is really a wolf in disguise who aims to devour the flock one by one. Every sheep on the farm has a unique personality and a variety of quirks that the player must become familiar with if they are going to parse fact from fiction. With a sheep being lost every night and only so many hours in the day, the player will have to spend their time wisely to uncover the beast before the week ends or be left with nothing. Wolf in Sheep’s Clothing combines classic mystery games with social deduction to provide an intriguing experience to players.

While Investigating the Crime:
  • Explore your farm and search for clues!
  • Interrogate your flock!
  • Choose your focus wisely with limited action points!
  • Write and save your own notes in your notebook!
  • Accuse the sheep you think is your wolf in sheep's clothing!
Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • ESC/ C - Pause
  • E / Left Mouse Button - Interact

Project Details:

Wolf in sheep's clothing is the third year project of Unknown Studios, a team based at Abertay University, Dundee, Scotland. Coming from a variety of backgrounds the members of Unknown Studios were tasked to pull together and come up with game ideas that could answer a design brief with the theme of “Misinformed”.  Wolf in Sheep’s Clothing was developed over the course of a semester and drew upon the skill set of every member involved to create a fun and engaging end product.
